sentences.sContent: Every day, a plane arrives to ferry guests to and from Bird Island Lodge.
sentences.sCn: 每天，一架飞机到达以运送进出鸟岛宾馆的客人。

synos.tran: （乘渡船）渡过；用渡船运送；空运

phrases.pCn: 渡轮码头；车船联运港；客轮码头

words.tran: （用船、木筏等）渡运（人、物、汽车等）；渡运飞机；摆渡（ferry的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to carry people or things a short distance from one place to another in a boat or other vehicle
a boat that carries people or goods across a river or a narrow area of water
